Based on the address register of the Hungarian State Demographic Record Office. Because of the time that elapsed between putting together the address list and the actual data collection, there were changes due to population moves, and to various extents it was necessary to use supplementary addresses. Out of the 1462 completed interviews 807 respondents were randomly selected to complete the so-called C questionnaire, which contained the Rokeach test.
